question: [Review] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.

qas.question: [Review] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.
[Rapid] English: Identify the intercept of the noisy line for the plotted line.
[Detailed] Portugues: Indique the value of y when x equals 1 da linha representada.
